alert.note: Alert for Des Moines (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 30 at 11:19AM CDT until June 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
